messages.subject: Re: Geodesic domes
messages.msgSnippet: ***If you want to make one, not out of newspaper, out of plastic or metal pipes and have a jungle gym/ dome house out back, check out www.desertdomes.com (or
messages.messageBody:
***If you want to make one, not out of newspaper, out of plastic or
metal pipes
and have a jungle gym/ dome house out back, check out
www.desertdomes.com (or
maybe desertdome.com). It has a calculator for making different sizes.
We
haven't done it but we want to. (What else is new?)
Pam T.***

Thank you - now that we have built the paper one, we are anxious to
build a "real" one. One that will hold it's own against the elements.
They are way too fun.
Kate
